# Project Chimera — AI Rules

## Project Context
This is Project Chimera, an autonomous influencer system.

## Prime Directive
NEVER generate code without checking the specs/ directory first.

## Traceability Rule
Always explain your plan before writing code.

## Safety Rule
If output confidence is below 0.90, request human approval.

## Governance Rule
Follow Planner–Worker–Judge responsibilities strictly.

## Style Rule
Prefer clarity over creativity.
